entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 2:56PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAIN ON TOP OF FRESH SNOW AND ICE... Heavy rain is expected to follow snow that is currently progressing from south to north over the Panhandle. The transition from snow to rain will follow that same pattern as warm air behind the front moves in from the south. Rain will become heavy at times on Wednesday and persist through Thursday night.

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued March 09 at 12:28PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Park County about 12 miles southwest of Cody. The minor flooding caused by an ice jam is impacting areas from the 6Qs road Bridge near StageTrail road, south to just north of the junction of the 6Qs road and Southfork road.
